example.name: Arg1
example.text: John's head's spinning was a result of too much tequila.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His spinning elaborate tales of his days overseas did not impress his date.
example.arg: elaborate tales of his days overseas

example.name: Metaphorical (story-telling again)
example.text: His spinning the truth of his crimes into a tale of a well-meaning Robin Hood-like character did not fly with the jury.
example.arg: into a tale of a well-meaning Robin Hood-like character

example.name: cotton spinning
example.text: Fifthly , export credits and full value tax returns are to be implemented for the cotton spinning machines export .
example.note: If this referred to a machine that just spun cotton around and around (like, in order to dry it), it would fall under spin.01. In this case it actually refers to a machine that spins cotton fiber into yarn or thread, which makes this fall under spin.04.

example.name: all args
example.text: Today , not only is King 's on a par with the large overseas manufacturers in terms of filament drawing technology , but to assist local downstream manufacturers in using its products , it has also set up metal fiber yarn spinning and fabric weaving plants , and is making efforts in the area of nonwoven fabrics .

roleset.name: Creating a new entity based on an existing one

example.name: Arg0,1,4
example.text: Then Sprint announced their spinning off at least a portion of their WiMAX infrastructure into a new company called Clearwire.
example.arg: at least a portion of their WiMAX infrastructure
into a new company called Clearwire
